nodes.name: bidOnAuction

bidOnAuction(uint256).details: Bidder sends bid on an auctionAuction should be active and not endedRefund previous bidder if a new bid is valid and placed.

params._auctionId: uint ID of the created auction

cancelAuction(uint256).details: Cancels an ongoing auction by the ownerDeed is transfered back to the auction ownerBidder is refunded with the initial amount

params._auctionId: uint ID of the created auction

createAuction(address,uint256,string,str.details: Creates an auction with the given informatin

params._startPrice: uint256 starting price of the auction
params._tokenId: uint256 of the deed registered in DeedRepository

createAuction(address,uint256,string,str.return: bool whether the auction is created

finalizeAuction(uint256).details: Finalized an ended auctionThe auction should be ended, and there should be at least one bidOn success Deed is transfered to bidder and auction owner gets the amount

params._auctionId: uint ID of the created auction

getAuctionById(uint256).details: Gets the info of a given auction which are stored within a struct
getAuctionById(uint256).return: string name of the auctionuint256 timestamp of the auction in which it expiresuint256 starting price of the auctionstring representing the metadata of the auctionuint256 ID of the deed registered in DeedRepositoryaddress Address of the DeedRepositoryaddress owner of the auctionbool whether the auction is activebool whether the auction is finalized

getAuctionsAmount(address).details: Gets the total number of auctions owned by an address

getBidsAmount(uint256).details: Gets the bid counts of a given auction

getCurrentBids(uint256).details: Gets an array of owned auctions
getCurrentBids(uint256).return: amount uint256, address of last bidder

getOwnedAuctions(address).details: Gets an array of owned auctions

devdoc.title: Auction Repository This contracts allows auctions to be created for non-fungible tokens Moreover, it includes the basic functionalities of an auction house
